text: They have earned his strictures. And his contempt. SOME people are for ever complaining that teenagers earn too much and spend it all when they get it. Now a survey of the Post Office Savings Bank shows how wrong that idea is.The biggest group of depositors in the bank is made up of boys and girls aged 15 to 19.
handwritten_text: They have earned his strictures. And his contempt. SOME people are for ever complaining that teenagers earn too much and spend it all when they get it. Now a survey of the Post Office Savings Bank shows how wrong that idea is.The biggest group of depositors in the bank is made up of boys and girls aged 15 to 19.
